presentationColumns.name: Receipt Distribution Amount
presentationColumns.description: Shows the receipt and application distribution amount.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AR Receipts and Applications.Receipt Distribution Amount in Document Currency

presentationColumns.name: Receipts Amount
presentationColumns.description: Shows the receipts amount from the customers.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AR Receipts and Applications.Receipts Amount in Document Currency

presentationColumns.name: Receipts Transactions Count
presentationColumns.description: Shows the distinct count of Receipt numbers.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AR Receipts and Applications.Receipts Transactions Count

presentationColumns.name: Avg Receipts Amount
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows: Receipts Amount / Receipts Count.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AR Receipts and Applications.Avg Receipts Amount in Document Currency

presentationColumns.name: Unapplied Receipts Amount
presentationColumns.description: Shows receipt amount from the customers that are unapplied against outstanding invoices.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AR Receipts and Applications.Unapplied Receipts Amount in Document Currency

presentationColumns.name: Receipts Applications Amount
presentationColumns.description: Shows receipt amount from the customers that are applied against outstanding invoices.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AR Receipts and Applications.Receipts Applications Amount in Document Currency

presentationColumns.name: Unidentified Amount
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AR Receipts and Applications.Unidentified Amount in Document Currency

presentationColumns.name: On Account Amount
presentationColumns.description: Shows receipt amount that is applied to On Account activity and customer is found.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AR Receipts and Applications.On Account Amount in Document Currency

presentationColumns.name: Other Receipt Application Amount
presentationColumns.description: Shows receipt amount that is applied to prepayment, claim investigations activities.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AR Receipts and Applications.Other Receipt Application Amount in Document Currency

presentationColumns.name: Discounts Taken Amount
presentationColumns.description: Shows the total discount amount that was taken.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AR Receipts and Applications.Discounts Taken Amount in Document Currency

presentationColumns.name: Discounts Taken of Applied Receipts %
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows: (Discounts Taken Amount / Receipts Applications Amount) * 100.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AR Receipts and Applications.Discounts Taken of Applied Receipts % in Document Currency

presentationColumns.name: Earned Discounts Amount
presentationColumns.description: Shows the total earned discount amount that was taken.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AR Receipts and Applications.Earned Discounts Amount in Document Currency

presentationColumns.name: Earned Discounts of Total Discount %
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows: (Earned Discounts Amount / Discounts Taken Amount) * 100.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AR Receipts and Applications.Earned Discounts of Total Discount % in Document Currency

presentationColumns.name: Unearned Discounts Amount
presentationColumns.description: Shows the total unearned discount amount that was taken.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AR Receipts and Applications.Unearned Discounts Amount in Document Currency

presentationColumns.name: Unearned Discounts of Total Discount %
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows: (Unearned Discounts Amount / Discounts Taken Amount) * 100.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AR Receipts and Applications.Unearned Discounts of Total Discount % in Document Currency

presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AR Receipts and Applications.Receipt Refund Amount in Document Currency
